title: The Wheel: Le Cercle des 7
overview: At the heart of a giant moving wheel 12 meters in diameter, a candidate will take his place and will have to answer general knowledge questions. At his side, 7 celebrities who are experts in their field have the mission of helping the anonymous candidate to win as much money as possible. In each round, 3 candidates fight for a place in the final in the hope of winning several tens of thousands of euros. To qualify, you will have to validate 7 themes by correctly answering questions of general knowledge. For each question, one of the 7 celebrities will be chosen by the wheel to help them. But will chance associate the candidate with expert celebrity in this theme? Be careful, at the slightest error.
